articles.title: Ex-Bafana coach Molefi Ntseki joins Kaizer Chiefs coaching ranks - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Former Bafana Bafana coach Molefi Ntseki has joined Kaizer Chiefs as the club’s head of technical and the youth development academy in a three-year deal with an option to renew for two more years.
